songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Wifisfuneral]
Stall back, I remember why I do this shit
Run away from you, but that’s as honest as I get
Could you tell the truth without a knife up to your neck?
Don’t mind me withdrawlin' baby, this me at my best
Wake up drenched in sweat, uh, this shit I regret, uh
This shit I regret, but I did shit I regret, uh
All these lights keep on fuckin' movin'
I’ll be silent, dyin' for amusement

[Verse 1: Wifisfuneral]
Hold up, I’ll be frontin’, geekin', lookin' stupid
Hold up, I’ll be frontin’, geekin', lookin' stupid
Save me, just save me, your main hoe wanna rape me
I can’t trust those hoes no more 'cause niggas wanna jeopardize my safety
Gothic bitch, on her witch shit, she tryna hex me
Burn her spirit slowly, like bitch you can not just check me
A dead man, standin' by my side and he will wreck shit
Check this, Smith & Wessons, we love testin'
I’m reckless, I need a fix quick, get out my mentions
I’m fiendin', blood leakin', I bit my jaw too hard
She screamin', she just want semen before I nod off
She wanna dance with the demons, I don’t do salsa
I’m creepin', my pistol creepin', might blow his socks off
She teethin', lil' baby teethin', give her ice to suck on

[Chorus: Wifisfuneral]
Stall back, I remember why I do this shit
Run away from you, but that’s as honest as I get
Could you tell the truth without a knife up to your neck?
Don’t mind me withdrawlin' baby, this me at my best
Wake up drenched in sweat, uh, this shit I regret, uh
This shit I regret but I did shit I regret, uh
All these lights keep on fuckin' movin'
I’ll be silent, dyin' for amusement

[Verse 2: UnoTheActivist]
Had a talk with the demons, got a Glock for the seasons
Call me dog, barely breathin', look in the act, don't breath
Better practice what you’re preachin', I’m blessed up like the deacon
Tryna find a way to lock in, saw some, and I'm weavin'
Yeah I’m bobbin' and I'm weavin'
Pop him right in the back, watch the bullets pop out the chest like cleavage
Just to show him my allegiance
Nah nah, I don’t serve anyone, only serve out beans
Only serve that good dope to the aunties that need it
Something fishy going on right here now I smell it, don’t like you
Every time there’s a full moon now I turn to a lycan
Or maybe they are the lycans, 'cause everything I do they bite it
But nowadays I don’t feel the pain like I’m prescribed to do Vicodin

[Chorus: Wifisfuneral]
Stall back, I remember why I do this shit
Run away from you, but that’s as honest as I get
Could you tell the truth without a knife up to your neck?
Don’t mind me withdrawlin' baby, this me at my best
Wake up drenched in sweat, uh, this shit I regret, uh
This shit I regret but I did shit I regret, uh
All these lights keep on fuckin' movin'
I’ll be silent, dyin' for amusement
songs.title: Every Fucking Pill in the World
